column3: The film premieres at Kendal Mountain Festival ( Tickets are available here: https://tickets.kendalmountainfestival.com/events/19-11-2022-19-15-descent-feature-film-presented-by-rapha ) and will be available to watch on Rapha's YouTube shortly afterwards 👍
Got chills watching the trailer. Can't wait for the full experience!
Watching this from my hospital bed. I too just wanna…cycle. I will get on that saddle again. Can’t wait to watch it.
Wow that made me tear up I know how my heart would be ripped out if I ever lost this beautiful sport of cycling !! Just so happy she recovered and got back to her freedom can’t wait to watch this ❤
Powerful, emotional, and stunning shots, can't wait to see it!
This looks intense and brilliant! Can’t wait to see it!
i always end up in tears watching this. the feels!
When and where can I watch this.
This made me blubber 😢keep going tough lady 🚴🏽‍♀️🚴🏽‍♀️🚴🏽‍♀️🚴🏽‍♀️
Don't give up ☺️😊☺️, be strong and Step up 👍👍👍Love cycling ❤️😗💕 all the way to the top.. God loves you ❤️❤️❤️
Dang. I hate it when trailers make me teary-eye’d. This looks amazing. I hope it comes out in theaters near me.
Looks amazing, beautifully shot and edited. Cant wait to see the film!
